section.name: Renaming /openmeetings context
section.p: If you want to have http://yourcorp.com:5080/yourmeetings instead of http://yourcorp.com:5080/openmeetings you need to do the following

ol.li: stop openmmetings if it is running
go to openmeetings install dir (for ex. /opt/red5)

open /opt/red5/webapps/root/index.html using your favorite text editor (for ex. vim /opt/red5/webapps/root/index.html)
find and modify <meta http-equiv="REFRESH" content="0;url=openmeetings/"> to be <meta http-equiv="REFRESH" content="0;url=yourmeetings/">

section.name: Changing hard-coded application name in string labels
section.p: To have Your Application Name instead of Openmeetings in all text labels you need to do the following

ol.li: login to Openmeetings as user with administrator privileges

find and edit configuration with name
application.name

Set its value to be
Your Application Name

section.p:
All string will display
Your Application Name
in place of
Openmeetings
